=C2=A0
> The Maximal shuttle lands outside Mt. St. Hillary.
 
The black an=
d crimson tank halted in its forward movement as the Minions faded from eve=
n his piercing sensors. Weapons systems powered down as its weapons assumed=
 a neutral position. 

Even as the shuttle came to a landing small sensors =
dishes turned to orient on the vehicle, but the tank made other overt movem=
ent.  

> Elder: Well at least the Minion presence was detured. Now to find=
 out 
> the story with this tank Transformers. Weapons ready. Back me up.
>=
 
> Elder exits the shuttle, looking to the Ark's tank defender.
> 
> Elder=
: Hello there. I am Lord Elder of The Watchers and currently 
> representin=
g the Maximals. We wish no harm to the Ark or our 
> ancestors...

As Elder=
 exited the shuttle the tank shifted form, the plates and struts of the unk=
nown being seeming to leap and shift as the former tank seemed more to refo=
rmat itself rather than transform into its towering robotic mode. 

Turning=
 as he assumed this new mode the newcomer=E2=80=99s icy cyclopean gaze lock=
ed onto Elder, =E2=80=9CCONFIRMED: YOU ARE LORD ELDER, COMMANDER OF THE WAT=
CHERS.=E2=80=9D The voice that emanated from the being was cold and emotion=
less, yet the power of it reverberated across the distance between the two.=
 =E2=80=9CHOWEVER YOUR LAST STATEMENT WOULD APPEAR FLAWED. HAD I NOT INTERV=
ENED YOU WOULD HAVE ARRIVED TOO LATE TO PROTECT THE ARK, THE REPERCUSSIONS =
OF WHICH WOULD HAVE PROVEN CATASTROPHIC.=E2=80=9D

(TAG)
